review: I am writing this review after 6 months of taking aligners treatment. The results are really good and visible. Doctor is very approachable and even a minor discomfort gets addressed immediately. They are very professional in terms of doing follow ups. *** ******* **** ** ** **** ************* *** ******** ******* It is one place I can trust to go for any if my dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Deepali Bhanushali is very friendly and experienced dr with soft touch n always smiling 
She explains very well what treatment she will be doing on our tooth n make patients relax
I have sent so many patients to her all are very satisfied with her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had first experienced dr deepali in 2009, when she was working under someone else.

Presently when i faced issue, i contacted her. I initially did not tell her we were already acquainted because i was having extreme tooth pain, and wanted some relief as early as possible. Nonetheless, presuming that i was a stranger, she was so supportive. It was already late, 10pm, when  i telephoned her, yet, she offered me the option of calling her back if my pain did not go. She was very patient and cooperative.

Next day, i visited her. She was thorough in her diagnosis. She pointed out not only what my current problem was, but also what the same issue could lead further to (the tooth giving me pain was causing decay on another tooth too).

10/10 would recommend and visit again
